long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance your search!

This extension will provide a uniform search experience by changing your default new tab and home pages to WideAndFar.com.

WideAndFar.com is committed to providing best quality search results to its visitors online!

By clicking “Add to chrome”, I accept and agree to installing the WideAndFar Search Chrome extension and setting Chrome™ New Tab and default search to that provided by the service and the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy.

Privacy policy: https://www.wideandfar.com/privacy.php
Terms of use: https://www.wideandfar.com/terms.php
